MCQ: Which theme in biology explains the unity and diversity of life?
Choices: a: Evolution | b: Chemistry | c: Physics | d: Genetics

MCQ: What is the importance of energy processing in organisms?

MCQ: What is a major characteristic of all organisms?
Choices: a: They can live forever | b: They are made up of cells | c: They can survive without water | d: They do not reproduce

MCQ: What is the study of life at multiple levels of organization called?
